skills.skill: Assisting with activities of daily living

duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist patients with activities of daily living.
Provide supportive nursing care, perform tasks as delegated by the RN.
Assist in maintaining a clean and safe environment.
Work collaboratively with staff to foster quality patient care.
Participate in performance improvement activities to improve patient safety and quality of care.

education_certification.credential: Current BLS issued by the American Heart Association Healthcare Provider is required.
Certification as a CNA, EMT, or related certification is preferred.
